Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class ConnectionSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.ConnectionSceneController
public class ConnectionSceneController extends Object
Controller that manages the waiting scene, where the players wait that the game starts

    • usernameError

      public void usernameError(UsernameError usernameError)
      Method invoked when the UsernameError arrives, making the player resend a new username
      Parameters:
      usernameError - a Message that warns the client of a Username already taken

    • reSendUsername

      public void reSendUsername(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Method that makes the client re-set the username if a usernameError occurs

    • reFirstResponse

      public void reFirstResponse(ReFirstResponse reFirstResponse)
      Method invoked when a reFirstResponse arrives, telling the client that it's a first Player of a new Game
      Parameters:
      reFirstResponse - a Message to warn the Client that he is a new first player, changing the scene to the selection of the number of players

      public void disconnectionMessage(DisconnectionMessage disconnectionMessage)
